activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11697
activity.text:
> we have heatmap API for achieving this instead of manually fetching slots of all days, but this is not available for public patients page!

So should I use another API or keep this issue, as it is easier to navigate seeing that green dots rather than manually checking for number of days.
